comment._content: Thomas Huston Macbride (1848 - 1934), Professor of the University of Iowa, see www.mushroomthejournal.com/greatlakesdata/Authors/THMacbr... www.continuetolearn.uiowa.edu/lakesidelab/about/index.html His wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Huston_Macbride according to that, he was the tenth President of the University of Iowa, serving from 1914-1916.

comment._content: Thanks for locating his full name B-59. We will add his first and middle names and correct the spelling on his last name.
